posts.message:
1000 members, a great milestone for our EgyptianGeeks page.
Thank you all for sharing & spreading the knowledge between the group members.
Thank you all for answering member's questions.
and Thank you for being part of our page.
Keep it up, and let's reach the 5000 members line very soon :)

posts.description: I’m one of these people that must learn by doing. Yes, I’m sure all those demos look very flashy and the code appears awesome, but unless I can do it myself then I have trouble really buying into it. And I really want to buy into Azure because frankly, it’s freakin’ awesome.

posts.message: Fresh graduate is required to operate and maintain a website build with Joomla for around 3k LE or more in Cairo. Experience with PHP/Joomla in general is favored. If anyone interested I will post more details.

posts.description: This is not a techie query. I am just unclear on how to pronounce the word "Azure" which is brand name for Microsoft's cloud service offerings.
